title: Called Back
description: Book 2 (Legoria Series) continues where Hope is back in her own world and desperately seeks a way to return to the man she loves. She is abducted by Heimrich, the evil wizard, and transported back to Legoria as a prisoner. He enters her mind and creates a dream like reality where she convinced she is reunited with and marries Antuan, her true love.He only releases his hold on her mind when he is sure that she is pregnant with his child. Hope manages to escape but has no idea that the twins she is expecting was fathered by the evil wizard.Having to confront the fact that six years has passed and the man she loves isnâ€™t the father of her children and not only married to another woman but also father to a daughter, she joins the magic school and starts working on ways to protect them against Heimrich as her pregnancy progresses.Recurring nightmares triggers her memory and she realizes that Heimrich is growing his army and planning to attack them soon. Will they prevail against another onslaught? Will Hope be able to protect her children from the evil wizard? Will she be re-united with her love?
author: A.M. Winters
